text: Hi <@U0UGH3X7X>, do you know what happened with logging? I'm not able anymore to activate debug logging in the latest version of the master :disappointed:
hi <@U0ZR63HLK> ... have not seen this but I'm still using one of Thursday's commits ... i'll check
i pulled commit 82064af  ,  rebuilt everything and ran my 4vp docker setup ...  debug logging is working for me

Question regarding `peer chaincode` comamands:
I assume `-p` and `-l` are only relevant to `chaincode deploy`, and `-n` is only relevant to `chaincode query/invoke`. Is that correct?
yes, I believe that’s the case
<@U0MSG4RL7>… the one exception is if you are running in —peer-chaincodedev mode
basically you are saying “already deployed…just use this name to send init"

<@U0ULK2JPP>: Thanks for that. I noticed that this is actually mentioned in `docs/API/CoreAPI.md` but under a section called "Devops [DEPRECATED]". I assume it would be a good idea to make this documented somewhere else too...
